lenders.name: Therese
lenders.loan_because: It is a great way to by-pass banks and money lenders and help get industrious people off the ground. It helps them, their families,their communities and their country. Therefore it makes the world a better place one small step at a time. The loan is not lost in some great big charity. It is tracked, returned and can be passed on to another deserving person. I love the idea of being able to know exactly where my money is going, whom it is serving, and how that person is doing.
lenders.occupational_info: I was a teacher. I taught french, and later took a position teaching grade three and four. I liked children of that age. Now I am retired and look after my house and garden.

lenders.name: andrea
lenders.occupational_info:
I am a sign language interpreter fluent in Spanish, English and American Sign Language would like to travel to a school for the deaf in Dominican Republic with a  documenting and volunteering /donating time and resources to the school for the Deaf in Barahona ( south west DR).
Structural renovations, clean drinking water and  electricity are desperately needed in the 3 rd world country. People with disabilities have little or no access on this island of Hispaniola. Education for deaf children are well reflected of the lack of working individual with disabilities.Money is desperately needed to keep this school running and  deaf children educated.   Monies are also needed as well as time/hours observing/learning visual/linguistic standards for communications.

lenders.occupational_info: Sometimes, I write stories for newspapers. Sometimes, I work on a screenplay (maybe one day it will become an actual movie). Sometimes, I just write on my blog, just to write. My "job" is as an editor for an IT consulting company. It's terribly dull! : o )

"Pass it on" that little favor you do for someone comes back a thousand fold.
lenders.occupational_info: I used to build equipment for special need children, children with physical disabilities, a carpenter I guess.  I am retired now, but it was a wonderful job.

lenders.name: dj.jobim
lenders.loan_because:
Last year, when I was at the lowest I could ever be, I had $6.35 left in my bank account.  I had 3 days to suffice on that, and even worse is that I was living in New York City!  I had to make a choice for that $6.35: do I keep it for a Metrocard or do I get a loaf of bread to last me through the next 3 days?  I finally decided on the subway ticket.

A dear friend of mine discovered about my condition and without hesitation, he lent me a gracious amount of money on the stipulation that I only pay him once I am financially secure again.  I never can forget that.

It's been a year since that critical, yet highly challenging phase of my life.  I have been thoroughly blessed ever since and that is why I am here.  Because I know how it feels like to be on their side of the fence.  And believe me, it's a really thin line between making or breaking one completely.

So now, it's my time to extend that "lending" hand and hopefully give someone facing an uphill battle a winning edge.  But in the end, I still believe I am the one who gets the most of out it =)
lenders.occupational_info: I am an independent filmmaker who would rather invest in good stories of everyday people than with mutual funds and 401Ks.

lenders.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: Talk to people and find out what kinds of products and services they want.

lenders.occupational_info: I build and maintain databases.

lenders.name: Kate
lenders.loan_because: I spent time traveling to third world countries and have seen first hand what a difference  a small contribution can make.
lenders.occupational_info: I am in the mental health field. I work with young children with developmental disorders.

lenders.name: Ken, Noah, Gracyn and Montie
lenders.loan_because: We are all in this TOGETHER! Next door, or across the world. "You're my brother, you're my sister, so take me by the hand..."
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a casino, standing at a counter and doing my best to service the guests.

lenders.name: madaline
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed me so much! I was fortunate to be born and live in the USA, and, tho I work hard for it, I have so much, and I believe one reason we are on this earth is to help each other. It is a wonderful feeling to help someone, I receive so much back when I do so.

lenders.name: lisa
lenders.loan_because: i love seeing people doing their own thing!

lenders.name: Darlene
lenders.loan_because: a little bit of money can change someone's life

lenders.name: caroline
lenders.loan_because: I want to give so that others may share what I have.

lenders.name: Bob & Carla
lenders.loan_because: We have been very fortunate and want to share with others.

lenders.name: Tiffany
lenders.loan_because: I love ingenuity.  The idea behind Kiva is innovative and I truly believe it is making the world a better place.  "If everyone did this"  just imagine...
lenders.occupational_info: I work in an office and spend most of my day analyzing the costs to run a business.

lenders.name: wendy
lenders.loan_because: I want to give other people in the world a chance to make their lives better and to help their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the office of a school.

lenders.name: Suzanne
lenders.loan_because: everyone needs help sometime in their lives.  Because I am fortunate enough to be able to help.

lenders.name: Molly
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do!

lenders.name: Joanna & Chris
lenders.loan_because: We want to contribute to something bigger than ourselves!
lenders.occupational_info:
We are both teachers.  Chris teaches science at Lancaster High School, and I (Joanna) teach World Religions & Social Justice at Sacred Heart Academy, a Catholic all-girls school in Buffalo, NY.  We love our work!

Please check out Joanna's website to see how Kiva has been used in the classroom!

lenders.name: Raquel
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in other peoples lives. I have been blessed with a beautiful family and a good life. The least I can do is share my blessings with others less fortunate than myself.
lenders.occupational_info: My work is very creative, stressful at times but overall fullfilling. I enjoy what I do for a living and some day will like to have my own business and be more creative.

lenders.name: Jolene for Jesus
lenders.loan_because: of Jesus' love. May God continue to bless you.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: Sharing is caring

lenders.name: Lewis & Sandra
lenders.loan_because: We have a little more than we need, and would like for more people to at least be able to meet their needs.
lenders.occupational_info: Life has  opportunities for those who seek.

lenders.name: Ivana
lenders.loan_because: we are one

lenders.name: jim
lenders.loan_because: It feels good. i have been blessed, and this is a great way to give back and help someone to help themself
lenders.occupational_info: i work in the public finance field. I raise money to finance schools, hospitals, etc.

lenders.name: Cheryl
lenders.loan_because:
This poem reminds me that even though I cannot do much, I can do something. And when many collectively do something it can have a meaningful effect in the world.

A Pebble

James W. Foley (1847-1939)

Drop a pebble in the water:
Just a splash, and its gone;
But there's half-a-hundred ripples
Circling on and on,
Spreading, spreading from the center
Flowing on out to the sea.
And there is no way of telling
Where the end is going to be.
 
Drop a pebble in the water:
In a minute you forget,
But here's little waves a flowing,
And there's ripples circling yet,
And those little waves a flowing
To a great big wave have grown;
You've disturbed a mighty river
Just by dropping in a stone.

lenders.name: Maria
lenders.loan_because: I loan because some one cared enough to provide loans and grants for low income students and these grants made it possible for me and others like me  to become a Registered Nurses when we had no money for school.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the charge nurse for a wonder group of Nurses.  I responsible for making sure the unit runs smoothly at night and that the patients receive the care that they need to heal and recover from open heart surgery or heart related illness. Serving Nurses and Patients is the greatest job ever!

lenders.name: Cris
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel good  that I can help someone hopefully fulfill their dream.

lenders.name: Bonnie
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people in need.

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: I care
lenders.occupational_info: I am responsible for the magazines & books in Stores. I also clean other peoples houses 2 days a week.

lenders.name: Steve & Jennine
lenders.loan_because: We feel blessed and want to help.  Having an impact on many lives is what Kiva is allowing us to be part of and something we share with our kids and family.  We've made it a family function to discuss who we want to help and "why" we are helping someone.  It's made a huge impact in their lives and ours.
lenders.occupational_info: My company manages, on a global level, the transportation of goods from one country to another.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: It's nice to help people help themselves. We believe in and support entreprenuership around the world.

lenders.name: Hendrikus
lenders.loan_because: I feel good when I give
lenders.occupational_info: I used to test software to ensure its quality and safety

lenders.name: Tammy
lenders.loan_because: We are all blessed with opportunities in life and this is ours.

lenders.name: stephanie
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to be or become what they want. Giving helps them get there just that much faster. It makes me feel good. There is nothing like having your own.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the customer service arena of my own. Sometimes we all just need a little help and a helping hand.

lenders.name: Jodi
lenders.loan_because: I can't imagine not helping someone in need. I am very thankful for everything we have and giving is a way to "pay it forward".
lenders.occupational_info: I help people who are sick and dying. We help them to stay at home  and live as much as they can.

lenders.name: Jeffrey
lenders.loan_because: it is in my heart to help others in any way I possibly can.

lenders.name: Sherri
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the lives of other people.  I want to share what I have been given.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach a class of third and fourth grade students (8-10 yrs old).

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: of a number of reasons, but I am headed to Nairobi this summer for a mission trip and hope to meet my Kiva friends.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a 9th grade student.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: A 76 year old homemaker. Mother of three. Grandmother of four.

lenders.name: Paula and Franco
lenders.loan_because: we love the idea of being able to help individuals around the world to become self-sufficient. We have been disheartened to see how our country's international reputation for goodwill has suffered in the last seven years. Kiva seems to be a perfect mechanism to repair some of that damage.  We have made this a family affair by giving our sons gift certificates so that they too can experience the joy of philanthropy. Come Christmas, they will share with us the projects of their choice.

lenders.name: Sheryl
lenders.loan_because: I want to stay connected, both locally and globally to the world I live in. I give locally because people in our own country need assistance. I give globally because I want to also remember that no matter how far apart we are physically, that we all look up at the same sun, moon, and stars. We're all connected.

lenders.name: Kim
lenders.loan_because: There have been times in my life when I was in need and I can remember how wonderful it felt when someone would care enough to lend me a helping hand.  I am at a time in my life now that I can be that helping hand.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for an agency that builds roads.

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: I want to help :)
lenders.occupational_info: I work in  a restaurant serving food and I also work as an artist: painting, sculpting, sewing and making new things from recycled objects.

lenders.name: Bud
lenders.loan_because: I believe  in Kiva's mission.  It is absolutely a force for good.  No interest loans are accepted world wide!
lenders.occupational_info: Theater producer and business consultant

lenders.name: Tee
lenders.loan_because: I care :)

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: Believe in all with Dreams
lenders.occupational_info: I have been working in the construction field for 18 or so years I am the one who pushes all the paper through for new projects the biggest project I have ever worked on is the one I am currently on its about 350 Million dollars its a Kaiser Hospital

lenders.name: Laurel
lenders.loan_because:
"whatsoever you do...."
Matthew 25:40
lenders.occupational_info: I help teach severely multiply  impaired / medically fragile students in a special needs school.

lenders.name: Diane
lenders.loan_because: I am able to and other people need our help.  It makes me happy too.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on preventing and cleaning up water pollution.

lenders.name: Klaus & Shelley
lenders.occupation: Public policy for Klaus and health care for Shelle
lenders.loan_because:
as small business owners ourselves (Shelley's dietetic practice), we understand the importance of access to capital and other resources to get started. 
We want fellow entrepreneurs to have fewer sleepless nights!!
lenders.occupational_info: Klaus works for a nonprofit that offers innovative solutions to public health challenges.. Shelley improves the health for patients who seek help with nutrition concerns.

lenders.name: Kerrie
lenders.loan_because: What goes around comes around.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at advertising clothing products to the Canadian market.

lenders.name: paul
lenders.loan_because: I wan't to help people who need help with their business, because it can change their life for the better.

lenders.name: mia
lenders.loan_because: I can!

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I like to give, and wish I had more to give.  People need a chance to make do in life; life is not easy, and I am thankful for what I have.  I hope all the Kiva folks succeed at their hard work.

lenders.name: Shaingo
lenders.loan_because: It's a joy to be able to help someone who is struggling.  Watching them get back on their feet and repay their loan is exciting and gratifying.  I'm SO glad I can do it!
lenders.occupational_info: I teach piano to children, I teach massage therapy to adults.

lenders.name: Erin
lenders.loan_because: I should.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world and especially to those who are trying to help themselves.

lenders.name: Colleen
lenders.loan_because: My parents, John and Elizabeth Sweeney, raised me to care about others.   My Dad died 11 years ago but a little bit of him lives on when I am able to loan.
lenders.occupational_info: My work is a combination of biomedical research and teaching at a UC Medical School.

lenders.name: Maria and her boys
lenders.loan_because: I want my boys to learn that life is all about giving and not receiving.  That there are hard working people out there that are not as fortunate as they are and that they can make a difference in their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an elementary school teacher in Portland, Oregon

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: If our country can bail out the wealthiest among us, then we should also help out the neediest. Eat the rich!!
lenders.occupational_info: Communications consulting for non-profits and foundations

lenders.name: Lynda
lenders.loan_because: in a fair world everyone will have access to credit at the level appropriate for them and their circumstances. I looked for a "kiva" for a long time and have now been validated so well by all my co-lenders. I am amazed and gratified by what I see here every day.
lenders.occupational_info: Helping people to live more fully and easily in this world. I take care of two incredible kids and a few older ladies. I live for my work and my 23-year-old daughter follows my chosen path with her own degree in massage therapy.

lenders.name: Kris
lenders.loan_because: We are all connected.  I want to help other people and make a positive impact in the world.

lenders.name: Sooz
lenders.loan_because: I am grateful to have the resources to be the giver while remembering a time when I was the receiver.  But for the generosity of people willing to offer me financial assistance when I desperately needed it to provide for family, I would not now be enjoying prosperity.
lenders.occupational_info: I assist lawyers in the practice of labor and employment law.

lenders.name: Helen
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others. I know what it is like to live in difficult times....I want to give hope and encouragement to others. To let others know that we are all connected and WE CARE!
lenders.occupational_info: Health care clinic. I am a medical photographer taking pictures of the inside of your body.

lenders.name: Mindy
lenders.loan_because: ...it's a great way to make a difference and help those in need! So many of us are so fortunate. It's a gift to be able to give.

lenders.name: Aleeza
lenders.loan_because: The ability to fund these loans to entrepreneurs around the world is so meaningful.  I can't think of a better way to impact the world and fight global poverty.

lenders.name: michele
lenders.loan_because: it feels so good to be able to do something for someone and see the benefit. I love to see all the different places and people and show my children that it doesn't take much to change someone's life.

lenders.name: Stephen
lenders.loan_because: I remind myself in America we are conditioned by the media and advertising giants to "want"  and we confuse that with what we "need".  Since loaning on Kiva only twice I rethink everytime I walk into a store and consider what I "want" to buy and what others "need". We all can change the world by very simple gestures and that choice is a blessing.

lenders.name: Tracy & EG
lenders.loan_because: We are finally in the position to "give back" and want to help others succeed and then they too can pay it forward.
lenders.occupational_info: Make people's homes feel and look nice, comfortable and inviting  to come home to.

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: I want my children to learn the importance of helping others
lenders.occupational_info: I am a stay at home mom that is raising 3 young children.

lenders.name: Shannon
lenders.occupation: Former Teacher, current Esthetician, and mom to be
lenders.loan_because: My mom gave me a gift certificate to Kiva !
lenders.occupational_info:
About to be a mother of 2 !!!!!!

TWIN girls !!!!

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: I like to help those who want to work and make a better life for themselves and their family. I enjoy being able to give back to people and help them enjoy a better life!
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the Casino Industry in Las Vegas and I take care of people from all around the world.

lenders.name: DEEDEE
lenders.loan_because: Selfish reasons really, it feels good to help others help themselves...
lenders.occupational_info: Joyous

lenders.name: Jessi
lenders.loan_because: The thought of helping someone without grand resources warms my heart and motivates me to make a positive impact.  Mother Teresa said " If you cannot feed a country, feed just one".
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the sports medicine field and help an Orthopedic Surgeon (A doctor that specializes in musculoskeletal injuries) evaluate, diagnose, operate, and run his clinic smoothly.

lenders.name: Douglas
lenders.loan_because: A little bit can help a lot, and since they pay you back it doesn't even cost anything!

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.occupation: glass and jewelry artist and teacher

lenders.name: Magali and Friends
lenders.loan_because: I have so many toys already and some kids don't have any money to eat and buy clothes.

lenders.name: Jai-Jagdeesh
lenders.loan_because: I can!
lenders.occupational_info: Joyous. Healthy. Grateful.

lenders.name: Dionne & Bruce
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: nicole
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others
lenders.occupational_info: I teach people how to ride and communicate with horses.

lenders.name: lilah
lenders.loan_because: positive change starts from the ground up.

lenders.name: Ann
lenders.loan_because: We can all make a difference.

lenders.name: Doris
lenders.loan_because: I would like to help someone improve his/her life.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired and do as much volunteer work as I can.

lenders.name: Marie
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired from a large US corporation where I worked for over 30 years.  My last position was as chief operating officer of an investment management subsidiary - where I was responsible for everything but the investing.  Over the years I was in many areas of marketing and finance.

lenders.name: Joyce
lenders.loan_because: I am donating in memory of friends and family who have passed away, Doris, Eva, Linda, Dick, Bonny, Karen

lenders.name: Billie and David
lenders.loan_because:
We're not passengers on Spaceship Earth...

       we're the crew.
lenders.occupational_info: We help individuals with difficulties in both the physical and emotional aspects of their lives.

lenders.name: Pat
lenders.loan_because: We usually don't get back what was lend out but thru this Kiva program does -- 97% vs (3%).  Where else in the world can a poor person apply for a small capital loan or ...?  Not even in the U.S.  In case u fall into the low (3%) consider as CONTRIBUTION for a well cause.  Kiva's lending program is allowing me to lend a "helping hand" within my limits.  So far all loans have been paid back -great news.

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I can
lenders.occupational_info: I help large companies to develop its business plans

lenders.name: Carl J. Cogswell
lenders.loan_because: Everyone wants to acheive.

lenders.name: DOROTA
lenders.loan_because: I CARE
lenders.occupational_info: WORK WITH CHILDREN

lenders.name: Matt
lenders.loan_because: This is amazing!
lenders.occupational_info: Conceptual video artist, filmmaker.

lenders.name: Tonya
lenders.loan_because: With a little help, many people can change their lives ... I am happy to be part of that help.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for the largest newspaper in the United States.

lenders.name: Kerrie
lenders.occupational_info: I am an artist. I work for a supermarket chain.I am a supervisor of myself,of course, and three other very talented women.We draw on chalkboards,murals,etc. for the company's 45 stores advertising what the stores offer, sales, etc. I love it very much and consider myself very blessed! My husband is an auctioneer and owns his own business and has been very successful,like I said earlier we are very thankful and blessed!

lenders.name: Gabriela
lenders.occupational_info: I teach at a university and I conduct research. I am an historian and I love my job.

lenders.name: Justin & Krystle
lenders.loan_because: it changes lives. We are so lucky to be live in such a privileged country and this is one way to give back and help others who don't get the advantages we get. It's amazing to see how this can be a start for someone or an opportunity to expand his or her business. We can all give up a little to change these people's lives.

lenders.name: Patricia Ferguson
lenders.loan_because: It makes me happy when women rise out of poverty, through hard work.
lenders.occupational_info:
Retired teacher turned quilt artist.
Passionate about Borzoi in art and quilts.

lenders.name: Ramya
lenders.loan_because: I want to encourage the entrepreneurial spirit! I have always admired those who take risks instead of settling for what is handed to them. Money not invested is a waste. What's better than investing in those who invest in themselves? I prefer that to just accruing more money.

lenders.name: Kelly
lenders.loan_because: you should have access to the money you need. I am lucky enough to be able to help. Best wishes from my family and me.
lenders.occupational_info: I run a service business in Canada.

lenders.name: Ix.
lenders.loan_because: I believe it makes a difference.

lenders.name: Donna
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to give someone a hand up.
lenders.occupational_info: Have been in marketing and sales, a college registrar, in corporate admin. Moved back to AZ from FL in 2009 Now retired and I volunteer with various organizations and am a political activist.

lenders.name: Ashley
lenders.loan_because: Jesus has blessed me generously, so I want to be a blessing to someone else.  "Pay it forward".
lenders.occupational_info: I tend to about 12 horses on my horse farm daily, plus I hold horse shows on and off of my farm monthly where riders compete.   I also judge horse shows.

lenders.name: Josh
lenders.loan_because: It's good way to feel connected to people around the world and support entrepreneurs

lenders.name: Patrick
lenders.loan_because: it's simply a good idea to participate and make a positive impact.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a marketing manager in high technology. I market software to customers in the US, Japan and Europe.

lenders.name: morgan
lenders.loan_because: it feels good

lenders.name: Evelina
Dayami and David
lenders.loan_because: every person matters and can make a difference !

lenders.name: Amy in honor of Grandma
lenders.loan_because: I want to help spread the wealth and encourage hope.
lenders.occupational_info: I analyze business financial statements and loan requests to help determine if a business should get a loan.

lenders.name: Jeanne
lenders.loan_because: I love to help others in a positive manner.  By loaning money to someone to help them run a business enables them to improve their situation for the long term not just short term.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on large corporate projects.  I am mainly in charge of keeping the project on schedule.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: I IMAGINE a world of all people living in PEACE.
lenders.occupational_info: Hello!   I was a concrete delivery driver.  I had a spinal stroke and cannot work any more.

lenders.name: Kata
lenders.loan_because: Many of us will at some point in life need help from a stranger, a friend we yet have to meet.  I have had that opportunity and now want to return the favor to somebody else. It's all about Karma and being part of the solution.
lenders.occupational_info: I am self employed and work most days of the week. I walk dogs and take care of people's pets. It's a small business run by me, alone.  I understand the hardship of trying to make it another day...  but I still keep an open mind and giving heart.

lenders.name: Mary and Peter
lenders.occupation: Director of Domestic Affairs & Project Manager

lenders.name: Monica
lenders.loan_because: We are all one.
lenders.occupational_info: Our agency helps individuals with disabilities, such as autism, mental retardation, cerebral palsy,  and epilepsy by following their lives closely and assisting them in finding the supports they may need.

lenders.name: Maryann & Amanda
lenders.loan_because: we admire their work ethic and are inspired by their determination
lenders.occupational_info:
front office assistant in a pediatric clinic
high school jr.

lenders.name: Carlton
lenders.loan_because: YAH has  blessed me with so much. Helping others is my way of sharing his blessings. Plus, it gives me joy to know that I have helped someone to make their lives better
lenders.occupational_info: Providing IT services to hotels across the globe.

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: I love this idea that I can help people without lessening the accomplishment of building their own businesses and improving their own lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I look for new ways to make computers help us solve problems.

lenders.name: DARRYL
lenders.loan_because: We all should take care of one another. Only then! this place we all call home would truly be a paradise.
lenders.occupational_info: i produce very creative images that tell ones story on television and over the internet.

lenders.name: john j
lenders.loan_because: It's a privilege to be able to contribute to this wonderful project.

lenders.name: Dominique
lenders.loan_because: we are interdependant
lenders.occupational_info: fraternity

lenders.name: Tanja Barnes
lenders.loan_because: I know the challenges of running your own business.
lenders.occupational_info: I listen to people through my hands and try to touch their lives in a positive way.

lenders.name: NickandMom
lenders.loan_because: Yesterday, my two year old took time out of his schedule to help a lady pick up her tomatoes.  When she said, thank you...he gave her a thumbs up! I loan because my son is very giving.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Nurse...I take care of all that need me.

lenders.name: francesca
lenders.loan_because: being lucky by having everyhthing we need for a good life, I believe it is important to give someone else the chance to get a better life

lenders.name: Eileen
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a Neonatal Intensive Care unit taking care of premature and sick infants.

lenders.name: April and Chris
lenders.loan_because: We want to help.

lenders.name: René
lenders.occupational_info: Software development services

lenders.name: HELEN
lenders.loan_because: I BELIEVE THAT EVERYONE CAN USE A HELPING HAND SOMETIME IN LIFE/WHETHER IT BE MONEY OR TIME - THIS TIME IT IS MONEY
lenders.occupational_info: I WRITE FOR AN ANTIQUES TRADE PUBLICATION AND ALSO SELL ANTIQUES

lenders.name: Gary Cottreau
lenders.loan_because:
I like the idea of these loans because I can help out and make a difference.  What is cool about this is the loan will be put to good use and I have a little say in where it goes. 

Also, the loan is a hand-up and not a hand-out. It can be reused once the loan is repaid and help another family. If I can help the parents with providing for a business, this will help their family members too with the income earned.

Like all economies - this will trickle down to the rest of the community during day-to-day transactions when purchasing supplies and buying daily needs.
lenders.occupational_info: Helping people with question about their services, bills, and getting new products. For example: cable television; cell phones; home internet and home phones.

lenders.name: Carl
lenders.loan_because: I wanted to help people in other parts of the world to make a success of their business ventures.
lenders.occupational_info: I organise the payment of employees salaries.

lenders.name: Luis
lenders.loan_because: I believe that the big financial institutions and governments across the globe often ignore -or just don't see profits- in the informal economies of the developing world.  However informal, these economies across the world are a substantial economic engine for lifting people out of poverty. Microlending allows  people to raise above the cycle of poverty towards self-sufficiency and growth.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the legal department of a large multinational company. I run the day to day activities of the department while the lawyers carry out the legal work.

lenders.name: Joshua
lenders.loan_because: I care.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a clinical research laboratory performing various micro and molecular biological tasks.

lenders.name: Dawn
lenders.loan_because: I want to help someone else make their dreams come true, to empower them and to enrich their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: difficult, sell advertising to the automotive industry in Florida.

lenders.name: Sid
lenders.loan_because: I believe we all can use a helping hand and my God has been good and merciful to me and I should be likewise to my fellow man.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a factory doing a variety of mechanical and electrical repairs.

lenders.name: Matt and Karen
lenders.loan_because: We love to travel and are happy to have a way to help develop some of the places we've visited.  Also, it's a lot better than just donating the money.

lenders.name: Jazuli
lenders.loan_because: To give a privilege to the under privileged, InshaAllah
lenders.occupational_info: Honest, hard working

lenders.name: Dahlia
lenders.loan_because: a change starts with you...

lenders.name: tracy and michael
lenders.loan_because: we have so much and think it is very important to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: i'm a banker and my husband is a graphic designer.

lenders.name: Max
lenders.loan_because: I need help once and was given the opportunity; therefore, I must pass on the act of kindness to help!
lenders.occupational_info: I choose a noble field - Medicine- which brings such a joy by helping others.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: We believe that if someone has a dream they should try to fulfill it and  if we can help that person achieve that dream or vision by a monetary loan then we are all for it.
lenders.occupational_info: Rob helps customers understand the value of our database platform.  He also writes technical books.

lenders.name: Mandy
lenders.loan_because: I saw this on TV and realized that helping other people provide for their families was a better way to use my money than blowing it on things we don't need. My husband and I are blessed to have good jobs and enough money to provide for our family (even though we struggle sometimes) and I love the idea that I am helping others to achieve the same blessing. I believe that these men and women are working hard to improve their lives and I am happy to contribute to that!
lenders.occupational_info: I teach reading and writing skills to 12 year old children. I love my job. My husband services air conditioners and heaters.

lenders.name: Bob
lenders.loan_because: To give back what I have been fortunate to earn.
lenders.occupational_info: My firm helps corporations educate their employees to provide customers an excellent interaction.

lenders.name: Mohit
lenders.loan_because: its a wonderful thing to do.

lenders.name: Happy Moose
lenders.loan_because: I am lucky and like to help others.

lenders.name: Team Spiers
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Bat Benevolence
lenders.occupational_info:
The plants and animals that live around us have stories.  I like to learn those stories and share them with people of all ages. 

I also write, draw, play music, free-lance graphic design, and design web sites.

lenders.name: Scott and Kara
lenders.loan_because: While we don't have a lot of spare money to donate to charity, the money we do have really makes a difference to the business owners that we loan to.  Plus, we like the personal connection that you get through Kiva.
lenders.occupational_info: My husband owns his own business doing systems engineering consulting work.  I stay home with our two beautiful children; I was previously employed as a software engineer.

lenders.name: Lise
lenders.loan_because: I loan because it's the right thing to do.  It's great to be able to lend a helping hand.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in market research.

lenders.name: Donna
lenders.loan_because: I feel I'm very blessed with a happy, healthy family. I feel if everyone would help someone in need, the world would be a much better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a mother of three , with a wonderful husband that provides for the family ,so I could be home to raise our children.

lenders.name: connie
lenders.loan_because: It is better to give then to recieve
lenders.occupational_info: A drop of water in the ocean of life

lenders.name: Wayne
lenders.loan_because: I am an contractor and understand what that sometimes business persons need help and shouldn't have to play politics to get that help.  I ENJOY helping others.  I enjoy hearing about my 'friends' progress.  I would like to see updates months after the loan has been completed.
lenders.occupational_info: I contract with a company to deliver trailers to dealerships around the US and Canada.

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: We have been very fortunate to have a great support system and wanted to be able to provide support to others across the globe.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who want to help themselves
lenders.occupational_info: I am the Director of Manufacturing for a Wood and Wood Products Company. Our manufacturing includes products for the door and window industries.
